channel.title: Sword Prince Games Presents One Shots!
channel.description:
Hi Gauntlet!
It's maria of sword prince games, SO HAPPY TO SEE Y'ALL YOU'RE ALL REALLY NICE. )= !!! And it's really encouraging me to share some of my own story games this month of june check em out:
*quick note: these are all playtests! all of em will be done on zoom. Most of my games usually inspire story-telling rather than roleplaying specifically but I'm also trying to see what's working and not working w how I designed these stuff.*
//this one is very short notice sorry, I had trouble posting last week// JUNE 16 ([date=2020-06-16 timezone="Asia/Manila"]) Here Lie Death Gods PBTA inspired, play death gods who fetch reluctant ghosts who don't want to cross over to the afterlife. Slice of life tonality, help a ghost fulfill their last regret but also do some supernatural shenanigans. https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8FjLFdWB-tBMCjVKkR
![cuG9wE|347x297](upload://ikSjunmDCZAXuEQwQ0fK0R5f8ep.png)
JUNE 23 ([date=2020-06-23 timezone="Asia/Manila"]) $Rich Kid Problem$ PBTA inspired. Play the sons and daughters of warlords, mafia bosses, monopolist media houses and your favorite corporate hegemony. That’s right! **Be born Filthy Rich** **TM** https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8Fq7NToYWUTb751qua
![_K_AbT|347x272, 100%](upload://A0RYbqO1STQpxokfoRgrk4LiE5E.png)
JUNE 30 ([date=2020-06-30 timezone="Asia/Manila"]) Endless Tales of Endless Beings Sandman Lasers &Feelings hack w/ a coin Mechanic. Play one of the 7 endless Destiny, Destruction, Death, Delirium, Desire, Despair, Dream and tell of a tale that's always been true. / https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8G4Fnuaxjag7mux8ns![1b02a2d13593e4d7e6e5ad68a06c0bb0|400x500, 50%]
All games will use **Safety tools** : We will be using script change, x-card, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).

item.title: Sword Prince Games Presents One Shots!
item.dc:creator: @Maria_Mison
item.description:
@Maria_Mison wrote:

Hi Gauntlet!

It’s maria of sword prince games, SO HAPPY TO SEE Y’ALL YOU’RE ALL REALLY NICE. )= !!! And it’s really encouraging me to share some of my own story games this month of june check em out:

quick note: these are all playtests! all of em will be done on zoom. Most of my games usually inspire story-telling rather than roleplaying specifically but I’m also trying to see what’s working and not working w how I designed these stuff.

//this one is very short notice sorry, I had trouble posting last week//
JUNE 16 (2020-06-15T16:00:00Z) Here Lie Death Gods
PBTA inspired, play death gods who fetch reluctant ghosts who don’t want to cross over to the afterlife. Slice of life tonality, help a ghost fulfill their last regret but also do some supernatural shenanigans.
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8FjLFdWB-tBMCjVKkR

JUNE 23 (2020-06-22T16:00:00Z) $Rich Kid Problem$
PBTA inspired. Play the sons and daughters of warlords, mafia bosses, monopolist media houses and your favorite corporate hegemony. That’s right! Be born Filthy Rich TM
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8Fq7NToYWUTb751qua

JUNE 30 (2020-06-29T16:00:00Z) Endless Tales of Endless Beings
Sandman Lasers &Feelings hack w/ a coin Mechanic. Play one of the 7 endless Destiny, Destruction, Death, Delirium, Desire, Despair, Dream and tell of a tale that’s always been true. /
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M8G4Fnuaxjag7mux8ns![1b02a2d13593e4d7e6e5ad68a06c0bb0|400x500, 50%]

All games will use Safety tools : We will be using script change, x-card, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows The Gauntlet’s Inclusivity Policy.
